item.title: inSilecoMisc v0.2.0
item.description: For 3 years now, I have been maintaining a small R ðŸ“¦ named inSilecoMisc that includes a set of of handy functions. As time goes, my skills evolves (hopefully in a good direction) and so does the content of these packages: I had function that suit my new needs, I realize that some functions I wrote are (better) coded elsewhere, I rewrite functions to make then more intuitive and I improve the documentation.
